name: io.github.crypto-ninja/github-mcp-server
description: The most AI-optimized GitHub MCP server: 112 tools with code-first architecture (98% token reduction) and compact response format (80-97% smaller). Built for cost-efficient AI development.

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with repo and workflow scopes

environment_variables.name: MCP_WORKSPACE_ROOT
environment_variables.description: Root directory for local file operations (optional)

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_APP_ID
environment_variables.description: GitHub App ID for enhanced rate limits (15k/hour vs 5k/hour)

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH
environment_variables.description: Path to GitHub App private key PEM file
